item.title: The Great Aid Recession: 2025’s Humanitarian Crash in Nine Charts
item.description: The world faces unresolved conflicts, growing climate crises, attacks on aid workers, two famines, and diminishing political will—along with significant aid cuts. Altogether, 2025 hasearned a grim new superlative: the worst humanitarian year on record.
